Header.title: Smart Hospital Management System
Header.paragraph: The Hospital Management System (HMS) is a comprehensive web application designed to streamline hospital administrative and clinical operations, enhancing patient experience and operational efficiency.

About.paragraph: The Smart Hospital Management System is a cutting-edge digital platform designed to revolutionize the way healthcare services are managed and delivered. This system allows patients to effortlessly book appointments, access comprehensive profiles of doctors, and check real-time availability of healthcare professionals.
